page.description: A list of A5 commands used in Alpha Anywhere.

argument.name: Command
argument.description: The command to send to Alpha Anywhere.

section.note: A5 Commands are not guaranteed to remain constant or available in future Alpha Anywhere releases.

case.title: DATABASE_CLOSE
case.description: Performs the File > Close Database procedure.

case.title: DATABASE_COMPACT
case.description: Performs the File > Database Compact procedure.

case.title: DATABASE_NEW
case.description: Performs the File > New Database procedure.

case.title: DATABASE_OPEN
case.description: Performs the File > Open Database procedure.

case.title: FILE_EXIT
case.description: Performs the File > Exit procedure.

case.title: FILE_PRINT_SETUP
case.description: Performs the File > Print Setup... procedure to display the Print Setup dialog.

case.title: HELP_ABOUT
case.description: Performs the Help > About Alpha Anywhere... procedure.

case.title: HELP_CONTENTS
case.description: Performs the Help > Contents... procedure.

case.title: VIEW_CODEEDITOR
case.description: Performs the View > Code Editor procedure.

case.title: VIEW_DEBUGGER
case.description: Performs the View > Debugger procedure.

case.title: VIEW_RECORDER
case.description: Performs the View > Script Recorder Window procedure.

case.title: VIEW_RECORDER_END
case.description: Performs the Close Recorder procedure when the Script Recorder dialog is open.

case.title: VIEW_SETTINGS
case.description: Performs the View > Settings procedure.

case.title: VIEW_STATUSBAR
case.description: Performs the View > Status Bar procedure.

case.title: VIEW_TOOLBARS
case.description: Displays the Toolbar Launcher dialog box.

case.title: VIEW_TRACE
case.description: Performs the View > Trace Window procedure.

case.title: WINDOW_ARRANGE
case.description: Performs the Window > Arrange Icons procedure.

case.title: WINDOW_CASCADE
case.description: Performs the Window > Cascade procedure.

case.title: WINDOW_TILE_HORZ
case.description: Performs the Window > Tile Horizontally procedure.

case.title: WINDOW_TILE_VERT
case.description: Performs the Window > Tile Vertically procedure.
